name: Flicker
description: Flicker is building its own ecosystem for real estate and e-commerce. Flicker where we introduce an innovative crypto token designed to revolutionize finance, real estate, e-commerce, and the traveling & hospitality sectors. This whitepaper outlines the key aspects of Flicker including its token overview, project details, future plans, staking program, tokenomics, roadmap, and the profiles of its creators.
